nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, Trace Martez owned a repair shop on Level 1313 of the Coruscant underworld. She had inherited it after her parents died. The shop was on the side of an underworld portal, where it had a landing platform that jutted out into the shaft. Martez kept a modified Nebula-class freighter she was working on in the shop that she named the Silver Angel. Martez met former Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano when the Togruta crashed her malfunctioning speeder bike on the repair shop's landing pad.
